ALL CREDIT TO DABEOM FOR MAKING THE ORGININAL ART.
link to his channel :https://www.youtube.com/@daebom/videos

if you have any suggestion for another sight, leave a comment, I will be more than happy to make it.

SEMI HISTORICAL CHI-HA SIGHT
Tested on 1080p only

Sight is based off of this video: https://youtu.be/OzhGnu1HjyA?t=680

#sight #semihistorical #japan #chiha

SEMI HISTORICAL(?) HO-RO SIGHT
Tested on 1080p only

MEANT FOR HE ONLY
There's no real documentation of the sight, but I based it off of this statement found in the japanese wiki on the Ho-Ro.

"The sights installed on this vehicle were capable of direct targeting and firing, and were based on the telescopes of the Type 97 5.7 cm tank gun , with the reticle scale replaced. This had a vertical scale for aiming up to 3,000 m, and directional scales of 100 mils to the left and right."

#sight #semihistorical #japan #horo

Well, its definetley not my first time making a sight, but it is my first time uplaoding here.

So i made Erika in a T-72M1.

All of the credits go to the artist of the image.

If you have any Feedback or Suggestions send me a DM on Discord: seancaseu (i know its a stupid name i just slapped my keyboard and called it a day)
